item.title: GE HealthCare beats on earnings, slashes full year outlook due to tariffs
item.description: GE HealthCare beats on earnings, slashes full year outlook due to tariffs

item.title: Etsy shares pop on revenue beat as company says it's 'staying nimble' to tariff uncertainty
item.description: Etsy posted better-than-expected revenue for the first quarter and said it's "staying nimble" in the face of tariff uncertainty.

item.title: Snap sinks 15% after withholding guidance, citing ad concerns
item.description: Snap shares fell after the social media company didn't share second-quarter guidance due to the uncertain macroeconomic environment.

item.title: Yum Brands revenue misses as Pizza Hut's same-store sales fall 2%
item.description: Yum Brands, the parent of KFC, Pizza Hut and Taco Bell, said sales rose 12% in the first quarter.

item.title: Starbucks stock falls as sales disappoint, turnaround pressures earnings
item.description: Shares of Starbucks have fallen 8% this year, as investors worry about tariffs and how they will affect consumer spending.
